actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to extend the protection of section 1114 of title 18, United States Code, to officers and employees of the Indian Health Service of the United States.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Makes homicide of an officer or employee of the Indian Health Service who is performing his duties a Federal crime.

titles.title: A bill to extend the protection of section 1114 of title 18, United States Code, to officers and employees of the Indian Health Service of the United States.
